mapper.sql: study_enroll_no, province_id, city_id, area_id, longitude, latitude, student_id, real_name, id_card, telephone, age, sex, drive_type, service_charge, enroll_status, drive_school_id, drive_school_name, price, id_card_path_positive, id_card_path_negative, live_prove_positive, live_prove_negative, address, test_result_path, enroll_account_no, enroll_password, actual_enroll_time, user_id, line_under_user_id, be_speak_meet_time, be_speak_meet_address, cancel_time, cancel_reason, is_intent_enroll, contact_time, intent_enroll_time, intent_enroll_school_id, create_time, update_time, is_meet_give, meet_gice_price, is_student, student_school_id, id_is_return, operator_id, enroll_type, is_in_study
mapper.select: SELECT t2.study_enroll_no as studyEnrollNo, t2.province_id AS provinceId, t2.city_id AS cityId, t2.area_id AS areaId, t2.longitude, t2.latitude, t2.student_id as studentId, t2.real_name AS realName, t2.id_card AS idCard, t2.telephone, t2.age, t2.sex, t2.drive_type AS driveType, t2.service_charge AS serviceCharge, t2.enroll_status AS enrollStatus, t2.drive_school_id AS driveSchoolId, t2.drive_school_name AS driveSchoolName, t2.price, t2.id_card_path_positive AS idCardPathPositive, t2.id_card_path_negative AS idCardPathNegative , t2.live_prove_positive AS liveProvePositive, t2.live_prove_negative AS liveProveNegative, t2.address, t2.test_result_path AS testResultPath, t2.enroll_account_no AS enrollAccountNo, t2.enroll_password AS enrollPassword, t2.actual_enroll_time AS actualEnrollTime, t2.user_id AS userId, t2.line_under_user_id AS lineUnderUserId, t2.be_speak_meet_time AS beSpeakMeetTime, t2.be_speak_meet_address AS beSpeakMeetAddress, t2.cancel_time AS cancelTime, t2.cancel_reason AS cancelReason, t2.is_intent_enroll AS isIntentEnroll, t2.contact_time AS contactTime, t2.intent_enroll_time AS intentEnrollTime, t2.intent_enroll_school_id AS intentEnrollSchoolId, t2.create_time AS createTime, t2.update_time AS updateTime, t2.is_meet_give AS isMeetGive, t2.meet_gice_price AS meetGicePrice, t2.is_student AS isStudent, t2.student_school_id AS studentSchoolId, t2.id_is_return AS idIsReturn, t2.operator_id AS operatorId, t2.enroll_type AS enrollType, t2.is_in_study AS isInStudy, t2.conversion_type AS conversionType, t1.order_no as studentOrderNo, t1.pay_time as payTime, t1.status as orderStatus, t1.order_amount as orderAmount, t1.payable_amount AS payAmount, t1.product_id AS classId, t1.pay_type AS payType FROM t_student_order t1 INNER JOIN t_student_study_enroll t2 on t1.study_enroll_no=t2.study_enroll_no ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t2.study_enroll_no as studyEnrollNo, t2.province_id AS provinceId, t2.city_id AS cityId, t2.area_id AS areaId, t2.longitude, t2.latitude, t2.student_id as studentId, t2.real_name AS realName, t2.id_card AS idCard, t2.telephone, t2.age, t2.sex, t2.drive_type AS driveType, t2.service_charge AS serviceCharge, t2.enroll_status AS enrollStatus, t2.drive_school_id AS driveSchoolId, t2.drive_school_name AS driveSchoolName, t2.price, t2.id_card_path_positive AS idCardPathPositive, t2.id_card_path_negative AS idCardPathNegative , t2.live_prove_positive AS liveProvePositive, t2.live_prove_negative AS liveProveNegative, t2.address, t2.test_result_path AS testResultPath, t2.enroll_account_no AS enrollAccountNo, t2.enroll_password AS enrollPassword, t2.actual_enroll_time AS actualEnrollTime, t2.user_id AS userId, t2.line_under_user_id AS lineUnderUserId, t2.be_speak_meet_time AS beSpeakMeetTime, t2.be_speak_meet_address AS beSpeakMeetAddress, t2.cancel_time AS cancelTime, t2.cancel_reason AS cancelReason, t2.is_intent_enroll AS isIntentEnroll, t2.contact_time AS contactTime, t2.intent_enroll_time AS intentEnrollTime, t2.intent_enroll_school_id AS intentEnrollSchoolId, t2.create_time AS createTime, t2.update_time AS updateTime, t2.is_meet_give AS isMeetGive, t2.meet_gice_price AS meetGicePrice, t2.is_student AS isStudent, t2.student_school_id AS studentSchoolId, t2.id_is_return AS idIsReturn, t2.operator_id AS operatorId, t2.enroll_type AS enrollType, t2.is_in_study AS isInStudy, t2.conversion_type AS conversionType, t1.order_no as studentOrderNo, t1.pay_time as payTime, t1.status as orderStatus FROM t_student_order t1 INNER JOIN t_student_study_enroll t2 on t1.study_enroll_no=t2.study_enroll_no ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT t3.id as studentId, t3.username as nickName, t3.real_name as realName, t3.phone as phone, t1.user_id as onLineServiceId, t1.study_enroll_no as studyEnrollNo, t1.price as applyAmount, t1.drive_school_id as applySchoolId, t1.address as address, t1.enroll_status as enrollStatus, t3.recommend_date as referrerTime, t3.recommend_user_id as referrerId, t3.operator_id as operatorId FROM t_student_info t3 LEFT JOIN t_student_study_enroll t1 on t3.id=t1.student_id ${ew.customSqlSegment}

select t.* from ( select tsse.*, (select tste.enroll_status from t_student_test_enroll tste where tste.student_id = tsse.student_id and tste.enroll_status='8' and subject_type='1') as subjectType1TestEnrollStatus, (select SUM(tstca.class_hours) from t_student_train_car_apply tstca where tstca.student_id = tsse.student_id and (tstca.apply_status='1' or tstca.apply_status='4' or tstca.apply_status='6' or tstca.apply_status='7' ) and tstca.subject_type='2' and train_type='1') as subjectType2TrainAppointmentSumTime, (select SUM(tstca.class_hours) from t_student_train_car_apply tstca where tstca.student_id = tsse.student_id and tstca.apply_status='5' and tstca.subject_type='2' and train_type='1') as subjectType2TrainCompleteSumTime, (select SUM(tstca.class_hours) from t_student_train_car_apply tstca where tstca.student_id = tsse.student_id and (tstca.apply_status='1' or tstca.apply_status='4' or tstca.apply_status='6' or tstca.apply_status='7' ) and tstca.subject_type='2' and train_type='2') as subjectType2TestAppointmentSumTime, (select SUM(tstca.class_hours) from t_student_train_car_apply tstca where tstca.student_id = tsse.student_id and tstca.apply_status='5' and tstca.subject_type='2' and train_type='2') as subjectType2TestCompleteSumTime, (select tste.enroll_status from t_student_test_enroll tste where tste.student_id = tsse.student_id and (tste.enroll_status='1' or tste.enroll_status='2' or tste.enroll_status='5' or tste.enroll_status='8' or tste.enroll_status='10') and subject_type='2') as subjectTypeTest2EnrollStatus, (select SUM(tstca.class_hours) from t_student_train_car_apply tstca where tstca.student_id = tsse.student_id and (tstca.apply_status='1' or tstca.apply_status='4' or tstca.apply_status='6'or tstca.apply_status='7' ) and tstca.subject_type='3' and train_type='1') as subjectType3TrainAppointmentSumTime, (select SUM(tstca.class_hours) from t_student_train_car_apply tstca where tstca.student_id = tsse.student_id and tstca.apply_status='5' and tstca.subject_type='3' and train_type='1') as subjectType3TrainCompleteSumTime, (select SUM(tstca.class_hours) from t_student_train_car_apply tstca where tstca.student_id = tsse.student_id and (tstca.apply_status='1' or tstca.apply_status='4' or tstca.apply_status='6'or tstca.apply_status='7' ) and tstca.subject_type='3' and train_type='2') as subjectType3TestAppointmentSumTime, (select SUM(tstca.class_hours) from t_student_train_car_apply tstca where tstca.student_id = tsse.student_id and tstca.apply_status='5' and tstca.subject_type='3' and train_type='2') as subjectType3TestCompleteSumTime, (select tste.enroll_status from t_student_test_enroll tste where tste.student_id = tsse.student_id and (tste.enroll_status='1' or tste.enroll_status='2' or tste.enroll_status='5' or tste.enroll_status='8' or tste.enroll_status='10') and subject_type='3') as subjectTypeTest3EnrollStatus, (select coach_id from one_fee_system_coach_student ofscs where ofscs.student_id = tsse.student_id and ofscs.bind_status = '2' and ofscs.pay_status='2') as coachId, (select product_id from t_student_order tso where tso.study_enroll_no = tsse.study_enroll_no ) as classId from t_student_study_enroll tsse ${ew.customSqlSegment} ) t
